Title: Mock Two Piece Bridal Evening Dress with Pearl Beading

----

Sku: CR749

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 8, 6, 10, 4

----

Colors: peach, ivory

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: CR749-peach-mock-two-piece-bridal-evening-dress-with-pearl-beading_p.jpg

----

Description: A mock two piece with pearl beading that creates a stunning halter top. The bead work is designed to scalloped the edges of the bust, neckline, and midriff. There is a belted piece across the midriff. The cut out back is accented with the design of the beadwork and the floor length skirt trains elegantly.
